title: Chroomy Digital Watch Face
summary: Get loaded with the frequently used feature all in one place with designed watch
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Get loaded with the most frequently used features with Chroomy Digital Watchface Free. This watchface has everything that you need to have on your smart watch. With various color dials, numerous options and ambient mode you will never be bored of this.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:- Multiple colored digital dials Unique design with Ultimate readability Date and month display Weather updates and current temperature Feels like and Humidity Visibility count and wind speed Background adjustment with weather Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to chargeThis watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Get loaded with the most frequently used features with Chroomy Digital Watchface Free. This watchface has everything that you need to have on your smart watch. With various color dials, numerous options and ambient mode you will never be bored of this.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

 Multiple colored digital dials
 Unique design with Ultimate readability
 Date and month display
 Weather updates and current temperature
 Feels like and Humidity
 Visibility count and wind speed
 Background adjustment with weather
 Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge

This watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
